wikipedia_page.main: Jerry Williams (born 24 March 1960) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder.

response: * Didcot is the birthplace of former Reading and Oxford United manager Maurice Evans and one of Reading's most-capped football players Jerry Williams.
*Jerry Williams, Jr. or Swamp Dogg (born 1942), American R&B singer, songwriter and producer
*Jerry Williams, founder of American band Harvest in 1977
*Jerry Williams (politician) (active since 2001), American politician in Kansas
